TextView.android:text: (f) Total Time, out of tolerance level
Physical Inspection of all radiating element
Check all cables and connector for damages, if any
Check all nuts and bolts which are exposed to atmosphere

Monitor System Operation(as establish during last flight check)
All Functions of remote control unit/RMM

Environment(Nearby new const., grass etc. in critical and sensitive area)

Status of RC Lines (a) Tagging of lines\n(b)Display of resistance of unused lines
5. System Operation on Battery Back-up (Voltage check at RMM)
